title: Higher latitude chain (Lat 68.6, Long 264.1), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Gjoa Haven, Nunavut, Canada, 0.5 sec, Magnetometer Array for Cusp and Cleft Studies (MACCS) - Erik S. Steinmetz (Augsburg College)

parameters.name: thg_mag_gjoa
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HEZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_gjoa
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_gjoa']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_gjoa
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_gjoa']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_gjoa
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_gjoa']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
